content: Warning: The hat is going to expire soon, please vote on the latest executive

SKY is now the sole governance token of the Sky Protocol. MKR holders are encouraged to withdraw their MKR from the Chief contract, un-delegate voting power (if applicable), and then upgrade to SKY promptly to maintain the ability to participate in governance and avoid the Delayed Upgrade Penalty.

Only withdrawal actions are supported here. You can vote with SKY at the new Sky Governance Voting Portal: vote.sky.money. For more information, please visit the MKR to SKY Upgrade Hub.
Click here to create a v3 delegate contract and start supporting the migration to Sky
